ides.api.utilities
Class HeadTailInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          ides.api.utilities.HeadTailInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class HeadTailInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream

Wrapper for InputStreams which allows the prefixing of the stream with a header and the appending of a tail to the stream. To the reader of the stream, it appears as if the stream contains the header, the content of the original stream and the tail.

For example, if one wants to add the tags "<b>" and "</b>" around the content of the stream input, it is sufficient to say:
input=new HeadTailInputStream(input,"<b>".getBytes(),"</b>".getBytes());

Author:
Lenko Grigorov
